attributes.action: Challenge all MP's, other than those facing actual criminal charges, who have plainly manipulated the expenses system, to match any money they return to public funds with an equal donation to Phil Packer of Help for Heroes (www.philpacker.com).  He demonstrates the British virtues we really should be proud of, and MP's should feel ashamed that they have lined their own pockets whilst our servicemen and women are being killed and maimed overseas.  He has set the example, it's time for those who run our country to start showing a response.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just paying back money to the public purse is not enough, and I can't think of a better cause to benefit from MP's assuaging their guilty consciences, both for fiddling their expenses and for sending people like Phil Packer to Iraq in the first place.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
